title: Bug 6410: File remains unchanged but is marked as modified by code assist
description: The file remains unchanged but is marked as modified by the code assist feature.
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as modified even though no changes were made.
EB: If code assist does not have any suggestions, it should not mark the file as modified.
SR:
1. Open a file with code assist enabled.
2. Type code without making any changes.
3. Verify that the file is marked as modified by code assist even though no changes were made.
